verses.name: Jeremiah 6:4
verses.text: Prepare ye war against her; arise, and let us go up at noon. Woe unto us! for the day goeth away, for the shadows of the evening are stretched out.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:5
verses.text: Arise, and let us go by night, and let us destroy her palaces.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:6
verses.text: For thus hath the Lord of hosts said, Hew ye down trees, and cast a mount against Jerusalem: this is the city to be visited; she is wholly oppression in the midst of her.
